lead_paragraph: Comments made by Sam Glasscock III, the vice chancellor of the Delaware Court of the Chancery, sent hedge funds and investors scrambling to make trades.

headline.print_headline: Energy Transfer Shares Surge After Comments During Merger Trial With Williams
headline.main: Energy Transfer Shares Surge During Merger Trial With Williams

snippet: Comments made by Sam Glasscock III, the vice chancellor of the Delaware Court of the Chancery, sent hedge funds and investors scrambling to make trades.
abstract: Shares in pipeline company Energy Transfer spike due to statement made by Delaware Court of Chancery Vice Chancellor Sam Glasscock III during expedited trial examining merger of company and Williams Companies.
